claims.object: The amount of stress that a material can withstand before undergoing permanent deformation

surface_layer.definition: A material property that defines the stress at which a material will begin to deform plastically.

deep_layer.mechanism: The point at which a material transitions from elastic to plastic deformation.

examples: Steel with a yield stress of 36 ksi

citations: PDF ASTM A1085 Specification for HSS - Steel Tube Institute
